topic.title: Adding, Removing, and Repairing Nodes
topic.abstract: Maintenance tasks for each node type in your cloud, includes adding, removing, repairing, and replacing nodes.If you are planning to scale up, have a failed server, or need to remove a node, there are a few things to remember. For control plane nodes, right now you need to maintain three. Therefore you will not remove a control plane node completely; you will just replace it. If you are swapping out the hardware for that control plane node, and the same is true for compute nodes, the process is to keep the entry you have in the servers.yml file but change hardware-specific information, such the MAC addresses, IPMI username, IPMI IP address (if changed) and IPMI password.
